propSpec.name: imageHeight
propSpec.desc: A percentage string that defines the image's height

propSpec.name: imageWidth
propSpec.desc: A percentage string that defines the image's width

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: A string path defining the location of the image

propSpec.name: alt
propSpec.desc: A text entry that is shown when the image cannot be displayed
A string that defines the images's tooltip text

propSpec.name: colorAltText
propSpec.desc: The color to display the alt text in
